name: test_e2e_with_logs[SQLI_TIME_012]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_012` |
| **Name** | Mixed case sleep function |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `SLeep(5)`
- **Encoded**: `SLeep%285%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `ADV_SQLI_001` |

| **Match Status** | `MATCH` |

## Test Execution Results
